channel.title: CVE Feed for Blue Plugins -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Blue Plugins -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-38716|2024-07-12T18:04:34.997Z -- blue%20plugins -- events%20calendar%20for%20google
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Blue Plugins Events Calendar for Google allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Events Calendar for Google: from n/a through 2.1.0.
